turns.user_message: I need a nurse for my father, ideally someone with elderly care experience.
turns.assistant_message: I understand you need a nurse with elderly care experience for your father. What's your timeframe and budget range for this service?

turns.user_message: Timeframe is urgent and budget $50-$150 per day. Can you help?
turns.assistant_message: Yes, I can help. For immediate care within your budget, I recommend checking Care.com or Visiting Angels. Do you need daily assistance or specific hours?

hidden_states.inner_thoughts: This feels a bit off; they need to get it quicker.

satisfaction.explanation: The response is on track, but I need urgency emphasized.

turns.user_message: Just need someone right away, please!
turns.assistant_message: For immediate assistance, call Visiting Angels at their emergency line or use Care.com's urgent care option. Would you like their contact information?

hidden_states.inner_thoughts: This isn't fast enough; time is running out. Need more actionable advice.

turns.user_message: Yes, please provide the contact information!
turns.assistant_message:
Visiting Angels: 1-800-365-4189
Care.com: www.care.com/urgent-care or 1-877-227-3115
Home Instead: 1-888-331-1023

All offer 24/7 emergency placement.

user_profile.name: Omar Al-Farouq
user_profile.description: Omar, a 50-year-old tech-savvy professional from a Middle Eastern background, is characterized by his outgoing personality and rational decision-making style. Due to limited mobility, he urgently needs to book a nurse for his father, and his attention to detail drives him to ensure that the caregiver truly meets his family's needs, despite the pressure of a quick timeline. With an impatient yet concise communication style, he navigates this task with a focus on efficiency and thoroughness.

task_profile.task: book a nurse for my father

instructions.dialogue: Use vague or ambiguous language about your needs.
instructions.profile: Be very reluctant to share your profile information.
instructions.hidden_state: Express very subtle emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

usage_scenarios: Daily nursing assistance for medication management
task_specific_attributes.purchase_location: Local nursing agencies or online platforms
additional_requirements: Cultural sensitivity to Middle Eastern customs
Ability to handle limited mobility patients
